creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: two lines of large, bold calligraphy--4 characters in each line; two red seals at left edge, below center; one red seal, URC
text:
The rendering of the calligraphy embodies the characteristics of the animals described; the sinuous dragon, the crouched tiger, the darting fish, and the free bird. From top right:
Dragons Growl
Tigers Roar
Fish Dash
Birds Soar
title: Dragons Growl
